DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this pilot study is to investigate the effect of an oral nutritional supplement (preOP booster) versus placebo regarding metabolic criteria in patients undergoing elective pancreaticoduodenectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Oral Nutritional Supplement (preOP Booster) in Visceral Surgery
DOC.criteria: Elective pancreaticoduodenectomy Concomitant chemotherapy Severe malnutrition (SGA score C) Conditions affecting gastric emptying
